name: The Fool
upright: A fresh journey awaits; embrace it with innocence, trust, and a spirit open to adventure.
reversed: You may be holding back out of fear or recklessly ignoring the consequences of your actions.

name: The Magician
upright: You have all the tools you need to manifest your goals—focus your will and make things happen.
reversed: Your talents are untapped or you may be using your skills for deception or manipulation.

name: The High Priestess
upright: Trust your intuition; answers lie within and mysteries are waiting to be discovered.
reversed: You are disconnected from your intuition, or secrets may be keeping you from clarity.

name: The Empress
upright: Nurturing energy surrounds you, bringing abundance, creativity, and a sense of comfort.
reversed: You may be feeling blocked creatively or smothered by overprotectiveness and dependence.

name: The Emperor
upright: Establish order and stability in your life by using discipline and clear boundaries.
reversed: Rigid control or inflexibility may be causing issues, or you could be struggling with authority.

name: The Hierophant
upright: Tradition and spiritual wisdom offer guidance; seek knowledge from trusted sources.
reversed: You may feel restricted by conventions, or it’s time to embrace your own unique path.

name: The Lovers
upright: Love and partnership are at the forefront, and important choices must be made with integrity.
reversed: Imbalance or disharmony in relationships requires honest reflection and decisive action.

name: The Chariot
upright: Success is within reach if you harness your willpower and move forward with determination.
reversed: A lack of direction or self-discipline is causing setbacks, or you may be facing inner conflict.

name: Strength
upright: You possess inner courage and compassion—use gentle strength to overcome obstacles.
reversed: Doubts or low confidence are holding you back; it's time to nurture your inner resilience.

name: The Hermit
upright: Introspection and solitude lead to wisdom; take time for reflection and self-discovery.
reversed: Isolation or withdrawal has become unhealthy, or you may be avoiding necessary soul-searching.

name: Wheel of Fortune
upright: Change is coming—trust in the cycles of fate, luck, and destiny as life turns in your favor.
reversed: You may feel stuck in a rut or resisting inevitable change; fortune may not be on your side just yet.

name: Justice
upright: Fairness and truth are key; make decisions with honesty and take responsibility for your actions.
reversed: Injustice or dishonesty is present, and accountability may be lacking in your situation.

name: The Hanged Man
upright: A pause is needed for new perspectives; surrender control and embrace a different viewpoint.
reversed: Stagnation or an inability to let go is blocking your growth; it's time to release old patterns.

name: Death
upright: Transformation is inevitable; let go of what no longer serves you to allow rebirth and renewal.
reversed: Resistance to change is causing stagnation, and you may be clinging to the past.

name: Temperance
upright: Balance and moderation will bring harmony; blend different aspects of your life with patience.
reversed: Extremes and lack of balance are disrupting your peace; adjust your approach to find equilibrium.

name: The Devil
upright: Temptation, materialism, or unhealthy attachments may be holding you back—acknowledge your shadows.
reversed: You are breaking free from negative patterns or reclaiming your power from unhealthy influences.

name: The Tower
upright: Sudden upheaval or revelation shakes your foundations, but ultimately leads to liberation.
reversed: You may be trying to avoid necessary change, or the impact of a shake-up is lessened.

name: The Star
upright: Hope and inspiration are yours; healing and renewed faith light your way forward.
reversed: A lack of faith or discouragement clouds your vision, but the promise of renewal remains.

name: The Moon
upright: Uncertainty and illusions surround you; trust your intuition and navigate through the unknown.
reversed: Confusion and deception may be giving way, or hidden truths are coming to light.

name: The Sun
upright: Joy, success, and clarity shine upon you—embrace happiness and share your light with others.
reversed: Temporary setbacks or unrealistic expectations dim your enthusiasm, but the light will return.

name: Judgement
upright: A time of reflection and reckoning; accept your past and embrace the call to transformation.
reversed: Self-doubt or fear of change may be holding you back from embracing your true path.

name: The World
upright: Fulfillment and completion are at hand; celebrate your achievements and embrace new journeys.
reversed: A lack of closure or unfinished business may be preventing you from moving forward.

name: Ace of Wands
upright: A surge of inspiration and new beginnings sparks your passion for a fresh venture.
reversed: Delays or lack of motivation may stall your progress toward something new.

name: Two of Wands
upright: You are planning for the future and considering bold possibilities beyond your comfort zone.
reversed: Fear of the unknown or indecision is preventing you from moving forward.

name: Three of Wands
upright: Your efforts are beginning to pay off; expansion and progress are on the horizon.
reversed: Obstacles or a lack of foresight may be hindering your long-term plans.

name: Four of Wands
upright: Celebrate your achievements and enjoy a period of harmony and joyful stability.
reversed: Tension or disruptions at home may be preventing you from fully enjoying your successes.

name: Five of Wands
upright: Competition and differing opinions are creating tension, but friendly rivalry can lead to growth.
reversed: Avoiding conflict or refusing to engage may be holding back necessary resolution.

name: Six of Wands
upright: Recognition and victory are yours—your hard work is being celebrated by others.
reversed: Self-doubt or lack of recognition may dampen your sense of accomplishment.

name: Seven of Wands
upright: Stand your ground and defend your position, even in the face of opposition.
reversed: Overwhelm or a lack of confidence is making it difficult to maintain your stance.

name: Eight of Wands
upright: Swift movement and rapid developments bring your plans to fruition quickly.
reversed: Delays or miscommunication are causing frustration and slowing progress.

name: Nine of Wands
upright: Resilience and perseverance are required; you are close to achieving your goal, so don’t give up.
reversed: Exhaustion or defensiveness may be preventing you from moving forward with confidence.

name: Ten of Wands
upright: Heavy responsibilities are weighing on you; seek support and delegate when possible.
reversed: Burnout and stress are taking their toll, reminding you to lighten your load.

name: Page of Wands
upright: Curiosity and enthusiasm spark a desire for exploration and creative expression.
reversed: Restlessness or lack of direction may be hindering your ability to channel your energy.

name: Knight of Wands
upright: Bold action and adventurous spirit propel you toward your goals with confidence.
reversed: Impulsiveness or recklessness may lead to setbacks if you don’t think things through.

name: Queen of Wands
upright: Charisma and determination empower you to inspire and lead others creatively.
reversed: Insecurity or jealousy may be undermining your natural confidence and passion.

name: King of Wands
upright: Visionary leadership and bold decisions bring you success and inspire those around you.
reversed: Impulsiveness or arrogance may cause you to overlook important details or others’ input.

name: Ace of Cups
upright: A new emotional beginning fills your heart with love, compassion, and creative inspiration.
reversed: Emotional blockages or repressed feelings may prevent you from embracing new connections.

name: Two of Cups
upright: A meaningful partnership or harmonious union is forming, bringing balance and mutual respect.
reversed: Misunderstandings or imbalance can create tension in relationships that need healing.

name: Three of Cups
upright: Joyful gatherings and friendship bring you happiness and a sense of belonging.
reversed: Overindulgence or gossip could disrupt group harmony and cause rifts among friends.

name: Four of Cups
upright: Discontent or apathy may be clouding your ability to see new opportunities right in front of you.
reversed: A fresh outlook helps you move past stagnation and embrace life’s possibilities once again.

name: Five of Cups
upright: Loss or disappointment weighs heavily on your heart, but hope remains if you look forward.
reversed: Acceptance and forgiveness help you to heal and move beyond past regrets.

name: Six of Cups
upright: Nostalgia and happy memories bring comfort, or someone from your past may reappear.
reversed: Clinging to the past may be holding you back from enjoying the present or growing.

name: Seven of Cups
upright: Many choices and fantasies swirl around you—clarity comes when you focus on what truly matters.
reversed: Distraction and illusion fall away, allowing you to make more grounded decisions.

name: Eight of Cups
upright: You are ready to leave behind what no longer fulfills you in search of deeper meaning.
reversed: Fear of change may cause you to remain in an unsatisfying situation.

name: Nine of Cups
upright: Contentment and emotional satisfaction are yours; your wishes are coming true.
reversed: Overindulgence or complacency could undermine lasting happiness.

name: Ten of Cups
upright: Emotional harmony and deep fulfillment bless your family or community.
reversed: Disconnection or hidden tensions may be affecting your sense of togetherness.

name: Page of Cups
upright: A message of love or creative opportunity appears, inviting you to open your heart.
reversed: Immaturity or emotional insecurity could cause misunderstandings or missed chances.

name: Knight of Cups
upright: Romantic gestures or heartfelt offers move you to pursue your dreams with passion.
reversed: Unrealistic expectations or moodiness may lead to disappointment or inconsistency.

name: Queen of Cups
upright: Empathy and intuition guide you in nurturing yourself and those around you.
reversed: Emotional overwhelm or codependency may blur your boundaries or cloud your judgment.

name: King of Cups
upright: Emotional balance and compassion allow you to lead with wisdom and calm.
reversed: Suppressed emotions or manipulation may create turbulence beneath a calm exterior.

name: Ace of Swords
upright: A surge of clarity or a breakthrough brings truth, new ideas, and mental focus.
reversed: Confusion or misinformation clouds your judgment and blocks clear thinking.

name: Two of Swords
upright: You face a difficult decision and must find balance before you can move forward.
reversed: Indecision or avoidance is prolonging conflict and preventing resolution.

name: Three of Swords
upright: Heartbreak, loss, or betrayal brings emotional pain and the need for healing.
reversed: Recovery begins as you release old wounds and open yourself to forgiveness.

name: Four of Swords
upright: Rest and reflection are essential now; take a break to restore your mind and spirit.
reversed: Restlessness or burnout may be warning you to slow down and recover.

name: Five of Swords
upright: Conflict or discord leads to hollow victory; be mindful of the cost of winning.
reversed: Resolution and reconciliation are possible if you let go of resentment and pride.

name: Six of Swords
upright: Transition and moving on from difficulties lead you toward calmer times ahead.
reversed: Difficulty letting go or unresolved issues may be hindering your progress.

name: Seven of Swords
upright: Cleverness or secrecy may be needed, but be wary of deceit or underhanded tactics.
reversed: Guilt or exposure brings consequences for dishonesty, or you may be coming clean.

name: Eight of Swords
upright: Feelings of restriction or limitation may be self-imposed; look for ways to free yourself.
reversed: You are finding the courage to break free from mental constraints and negative thinking.

name: Nine of Swords
upright: Anxiety or sleepless nights point to worries that may be weighing heavily on your mind.
reversed: You are beginning to release fears and see hope beyond your troubles.

name: Ten of Swords
upright: A painful ending or betrayal marks a low point, but recovery and renewal are possible.
reversed: Regeneration and release help you rise from hardship and embrace new possibilities.

name: Page of Swords
upright: Curiosity and a thirst for knowledge drive you to seek the truth and express new ideas.
reversed: Impulsiveness or haste in communication may cause misunderstandings or conflict.

name: Knight of Swords
upright: Bold action and determination push you to pursue your goals with speed and confidence.
reversed: Recklessness or impatience may lead to rash decisions or harsh words.

name: Queen of Swords
upright: Clarity, honesty, and discernment help you see situations objectively and speak your truth.
reversed: Coldness or bitterness may cloud your judgment and distance you from others.

name: King of Swords
upright: Intellectual power and authority enable you to lead with integrity and wise judgment.
reversed: Manipulation or misuse of power may lead to unfairness or a lack of compassion.

name: Ace of Pentacles
upright: A new opportunity for prosperity and growth appears, promising stability and abundance.
reversed: Missed chances or financial delays may block your path to security.

name: Two of Pentacles
upright: Balance and adaptability are key as you juggle multiple responsibilities or priorities.
reversed: Overwhelm or poor time management could result in things slipping out of control.

name: Three of Pentacles
upright: Collaboration and teamwork lead to tangible results and the building of solid foundations.
reversed: Miscommunication or lack of cooperation may be undermining your progress.

name: Four of Pentacles
upright: Security and stability are valued, but beware of holding on too tightly to material things.
reversed: Letting go of control or loosening your grip can free you from financial or emotional constraints.

name: Five of Pentacles
upright: Hardship or financial struggle tests your resilience, but support is available if you reach out.
reversed: Recovery and renewed hope are emerging after a period of adversity.

name: Six of Pentacles
upright: Generosity and sharing resources bring balance and harmony to your relationships.
reversed: Unequal give-and-take or strings attached may be creating resentment or imbalance.

name: Seven of Pentacles
upright: Patience and careful planning are required; your efforts will yield results in due time.
reversed: Impatience or lack of progress may cause frustration and a desire to give up.

name: Eight of Pentacles
upright: Dedication and hard work help you master your craft and steadily improve your situation.
reversed: Boredom or perfectionism could be stalling your growth or making work feel unfulfilling.

name: Nine of Pentacles
upright: Self-sufficiency and financial independence allow you to enjoy the fruits of your labor.
reversed: Overdependence or setbacks may be interfering with your sense of accomplishment.

name: Ten of Pentacles
upright: Long-term security, family legacy, and abundance are yours to enjoy and pass on.
reversed: Instability or disputes over wealth and inheritance may disrupt family harmony.

name: Page of Pentacles
upright: Curiosity and practicality help you pursue new opportunities for learning and growth.
reversed: Procrastination or lack of focus could keep you from achieving your goals.

name: Knight of Pentacles
upright: Reliability and steady effort lead to success, even if progress seems slow.
reversed: Stubbornness or laziness may cause delays or missed opportunities.

name: Queen of Pentacles
upright: Nurturing and resourceful energy help you create comfort, security, and well-being.
reversed: Neglect of self-care or overcommitment may drain your energy or create imbalance.

name: King of Pentacles
upright: Leadership and wise investment bring wealth, stability, and respect from others.
reversed: Greed or mismanagement of resources can undermine your achievements.
